Articles.Content:
I was thinking, is there any mods that add in balloons used to soften landings? Sort of like what Luna 9, and (I think) the Opportunity Rover used. If there are any mods that add this in, could you please send me a link to them?

Thanks
This request for mod advice is being moved to General Add-On Affairs, the place for all your mod-related questions.

I was thinking, is there any mods that add in balloons used to soften landings? Sort of like what Luna 9, and (I think) the Opportunity Rover used. If there are any mods that add this in, could you please send me a link to them?

Thanks

Check out RoverDudes USI Survavblity pack.. it adds airbags just like your talking about. (also adds floats)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84359
You might try here USI Survivability Pack http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84359
There's also airbags in Lack's SXT. --> http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542
